thread.title: Murder video goes viral; cops identify accused
thread.title_full: Murder video goes viral; cops identify accused

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Murder video goes viral; cops identify accused
text:
Tribune News Service
Amritsar, October 17
A day after the brutal murder of a factory labourer, a video of the incident has gone viral. He was allegedly beaten up by the factory owner and some of his employees. The deceased was identified as Ram Singh. Factory owner Jaspreet Singh and two unidentified persons have been booked. The police have also identified the second accused. The police have launched a manhunt to nab the culprits. The video revealed that Ram Singh was tortured. He was hanged upside down with his hands and legs tied. He was repeatedly hit by a rod while he claimed to be innocent. Raji, wife of the deceased, told the police her husband used to do cleaning work at factories near the New Focal Point area. She said a few days ago, some iron material was stolen from a factory. She alleged the factory owner suspected that the theft was committed by Ram, an allegation he had refuted. She alleged that yesterday, around 8.30 am, Jaspreet along with two unidentified persons came in an Innova car and bundled her husband into the vehicle and sped away. She alleged they took him to some secluded place and thrashed him. In the evening, his body was found. Narinder Kaur, SHO, Mohkampura police station, said they had identified the second accused as Mohinder Singh, who was also a migrant.
